title: Bleak Flesh - Transcendence [Metal] (2014) (mp3)
description:
Bleak Flesh - Transcendence [Metal] (2014) (mp3)

Bleak Flesh is a chilean band formed in 2009 after the break of a previous project. By the end of the year the band decided to record their first demo entitled "MARCHING TO WAR".

Two years later after many line-up changes and gigs including a support act for Cradle of Filth, the band began to take a new musical direction adding progressive and technical elements to their style.

In 2013 Bleak Flesh releases their debut EP called "THE GATEWAY" presenting four tracks with an interesting mix between metal genres like melodic death, technical death with progressive touches and Djent influences.

2014 the band started the recordings of their LP called "TRANSCENDENCE". The album was released on 7/19/2014, twelve tracks for fans of technical, progressive and melodic death metal. "TRANSCENDENCE" is available on bandcamp for digital downloading in hi quality formats like mp3 320, FLAC, ALAC (Apple Lossless), AAC, or Ogg Vorbis.
